CustomField.description: Formula to derive a score based on complexity of interfacing the device being connected
CustomField.formula: CASE( Contract__r.RALS_Module__c , "Accriva Blood Oximeter (ITC Avoximeter)", 1, "Alere Cardiac Marker", 1, "Helena Labs Coagulation", 1, "Lifehealth Blood Gas (Formerly ITC IRMA)", 1, "Medtronic Coagulation ACT Plus", 1, "Quidel Immunoassays", 1, "Medtronic Coagulation ACT Plus", 1, "Roche Urinalysis", 1, "Siemens Urinalysis Status/Status +", 1, "Siemens Acute Care Diagnostic System", 1, "MTE - Manual Test Entry", 1, "Abbott i-STAT POCz", 2, "Abaxis Chemistry", 2, "IL Blood Gas GEM 3000/3500", 2, "IL Blood Gas GEM 4000", 2, "Medtronic Coagulation HMS PLUS", 2, "Mitsubishi Cardiac Marker", 2, "Radiometer Blood Gas", 2, "Roche Blood Gas", 2, "Siemens Blood Gas", 2, "Alere Hemostasis/Hematology/Immunoassay", 3, 0)
CustomField.label: * Pscore Device Interfacing
